content.question: Economic complementarities between two places tend to

choices.label: reflect only differences in resource base
occur when each place specializes in commodities demanded by the other
occur when the places specialize in the same commodities

content.answer: occur when each place specializes in commodities demanded by the other

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe spatial patterns, networks, and relationships.
